entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Swift Current
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:56 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -22.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Swift Current Airport 3:51 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -22.5°C
Pressure: 103.4 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -25.2°C
Wind: SSE 42 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Blowing snow. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of freezing rain or ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 70 percent chance of ice pellets late in the evening. Periods of freezing rain beginning near midnight. Wind south 30 km/h becoming west 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
